// Java逻辑运算符判断闰年
// 闰年：能被4整除并且不能被100整除，或者能被400整除
package xiangmu;
public class Ceshi {
    public static void main(String args[]) {
        int nian = 1900;
        if(nian % 4 == 0 && nian % 100 != 0 || nian % 400 == 0) {
            dayin(nian + "是闰年");
        }else {
            dayin(nian + "不是闰年");
        }
    }
    public static void dayin(String zifuchuan) {
        System.out.println(zifuchuan);
    }
} 
1900不是闰年
